bike.description: SX Trail M5 Premium Aluminum frame, ORE TT/DT, forged HT, full cartridge bearing pivots and shock yoke, ISCG mount, replaceable derailleur hanger, derailleur guard, 170mm travel

components.description: Specialized DHX RC4 coil 7.875x2.25" for SX Trail, rebound adj., High and low speed compression adj. and bottom out control, S:500, M:550, L:600
Fox 36 Van RC2, 160mm travel, low/high speed compression and rebound adj. 20mm thru-axle, alloy tapered steerer
1-1/8" cartridge alloy upper and 1.5" lower cartridge bearing
Specialized, 35mm extension, OS 31.8, 4-bolt, forged
Specialized Demo low-rise bar, 7050 alloy, 31.8mm, 750mm wide, 9 degree backsweep, 6 degree up
Specialized waffle lock on grip (S/M) Specialized Thick lock on grip (L) with alloy end plug
Custom Avid Code CR Mag hydraulic disc, Mag CR lever with tooless reach and pad contact adj. Code caliper, stainless hardware, 203mm rotor
Custom Avid Code CR Mag hydraulic disc, Mag CR lever with tooless reach and pad contact adj. Code caliper, stainless hardware, 185mm rotor
Custom Avid Code CR Mag Hydraulic, tool-less reach and pad contact adj.
Shimano M660 SLX, DMD, top swing, dual pull
SRAM X-0, 9-speed, mid cage
SRAM X-9 aluminum trigger
Shimano HG61, 9-speed, 11-34t
SRAM PC-971, 9-speed w/Power Link
FSA Gravity Lite MegaExo, forged hollow arms, 24A/36A  rings with Gamut shift guide
FSA BB-7000 for Gravity Lite crank, 73mm shell
Specialized Lo-Pro Mag
Custom DT Swiss F550, 30mm wide, 32h
Hi-Lo disc, 20mm thru-axle, 32h
Thru axle 135mm, hollow 10mm Cr-Mo axle w/ RD guard
DT Swiss Competition 2.0/1.8/2.0mm stainless
Specialized Clutch SX 26x2.3", SX casing, aramid bead, dual compound
Specialized Chunder SX 26x2.3", SX casing, aramid bead, dual compound
Presta valve
Specialized Enduro, 8mm hollow Cr-Mo rails, SL foam
Thomson straight w/ 12 degree clamp, 367mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
